segments.text: I'm looking into this kitchen, and it's quite a scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely engrossed in drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just pouring out of the sink, right over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a large puddle on the floor already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually standing right in it, which is incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the cold water on her skin.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so focused on that one plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is clearly running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could cause some serious water damage if it continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shocking amount of water for such a simple task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit concerned for the floorboards and cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR
